meanings.sent1: The car drove accelerando down the highway.

meanings.definition: A passage of music that gradually speeds up.
meanings.sent1: The accelerando in the symphony added excitement to the performance.
meanings.sent2: The pianist executed the accelerando flawlessly.
meanings.sent3: The accelerando in the song made the dancers move faster.
